H3.text: when did the united states host the world cup. 1994

A4.text: The 1994 FIFA World Cup was the 15th FIFA World Cup, the world championship for men's national soccer teams. It was hosted by the United States and took place from June 17 to July 17, 1994, at nine venues across the country.

A5.text: The United States was chosen as the host by FIFA on July 4, 1988.
